710.28.text: I'm just gonna, kind of, end with a quote.

712.64.text: This is a quote from Mark Twain.

715.21.text: you'll be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do

717.95.text: than by the ones you did do.

719.82.text: So, throw off the bowline, sail away from the safe harbor

722.49.text: catch the trade winds in your sails.

727.36.text: And then to add, in my own words

729.40.text: kind of what I learned from this trip is--

731.13.text: Don't let the fear of failure stop you.

734.57.text: Fear of failure is a really powerful thing.

739.57.text: But, there's no courage, without fear.

741.97.text: So, embrace the fear, love the suffering, take a risk

746.05.text: laugh at yourself, a lot. And dive in and try

750.05.text:
'cause, you'll never have an
adventure without a little fear.
